title: League of Legends Movie
body: Has anyone ever thought that Riot should make a movie, I would suggest that Riot should make a movie about Shurima as in like putting every shuriman champions lore into one big move or Riot should make a movie about every champions lore into one big movie.

replies.body:
maybe not a lengthy 90+ minutes movie.
30-minute movie is fine.

Shurima, Warwick vs Soraka, The Void saga, Cait-Vi-Jinx, etc.
There's too much lore to fit into a single movie doe.

There's also too much lore in Warcraft to fit into a single movie - but they have managed to do that.

It's a matter of choosing what lore to use, and make a movie out of that. 

Good point none-the-less.
Not to mention most of League's lore doesn't even have any kind of conclusive ending or a middle.  Actually I don't think there's any conclusive endings in League's lore.

Actually some of Leagues Lore does have a ending and a middle you just haven't been bothered to read the lore's of the champions to see if there is a middle and an end. And also World of Warcraft has a lot of story behind it and somehow they mange to make a movie out of it, but riot should at least make an animated film about shurima.

Which parts of League's lore have a conclusive ending and a middle? I'm pretty sure I'm up to date on the vast majority of lores in this game.

I mean maybe you could argue the fall of Shurima, but I would say that's not really conclusive and honestly serves as more of an introduction to the current conflicts between characters than it's own complete story. 

We also still have a few loose ends in the Bilgewater lore.

That's a very good point ILLIDALIAN, WoW does have a lot of story behind it but they may have cut out some of it's story and made it short so it can go into a massive film production but listen to this instead of putting everyone's lore into one movie aka WoW Riot should at least make an animated film about Shurima.

The movie, if made, will likely be a steaming pile of shite if previous movies have told us anything.

It would be better as a mini-series of sorts. Individual mini-series for each place of note i.e. Shurima, Bandle City, Noxus etc. and it would be probably better if it was animated to avoid a live-action with excessive use of CGI
True, but what if they just made an animated movie about shurima.
I would definitely go and see a movie with any lore from League.
I can't imagine it being any good. It's better as an animated series. There's one on youtube. Can't remember it's name though.
I think this would be awesome!! It would sure make me care about the champions lore a lot more!!!
